name: messianic
content:

formal relating or belonging to a messiah: He announced the imminent arrival of a messianic leader.
A messianic religious group believes that a leader will or has come who has the power to change the world and bring peace: a messianic cult/movement/sect
A messianic speech or style is very determined and full of emotion: She talks about her work with a messianic zeal.
